fetch.user_auth: SELECT username, displayname, password FROM user WHERE username=?
fetch.user_id: SELECT id FROM user WHERE username=?
fetch.user_name: SELECT displayname FROM user WHERE id=?
fetch.highest_voted_posts: SELECT * FROM post ORDER BY votes DESC LIMIT ?
fetch.recent_posts: SELECT * FROM post ORDER BY pub_date DESC LIMIT ?
fetch.post_comments: SELECT * FROM comment WHERE post_id=? ORDER BY pub_date DESC LIMIT ?
fetch.vote_on_post: SELECT value FROM post_votes WHERE voter_id=? AND post_id=?
fetch.vote_on_comment: SELECT value FROM comment_votes WHERE voter_id=? AND post_id=? AND comment_id=?

create.user: INSERT INTO user (username, displayname, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
create.post: INSERT INTO post (title, content, description, programming_language, publisher_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
create.comment: INSERT INTO comment (content, publisher_id, post_id, parent_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
create.post_vote: INSERT INTO post_votes (value, voter_id, post_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
create.comment_vote: INSERT INTO comment_votes (value, voter_id, post_id, comment_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

update.user_last_login: UPDATE user SET last_login = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE username = ?
update.post_votes_value: UPDATE post SET votes = votes + ? WHERE id=?
update.comment_votes_value: UPDATE comment SET votes = votes + ? WHERE post_id=? AND id=?

delete.post_vote: DELETE FROM post_votes WHERE voter_id=? AND post_id=?
delete.comment_vote: DELETE FROM comment_votes WHERE voter_id=? AND post_id=? AND comment_id=?
